texts.name: Lysander
texts.biography: Necromancers attacked Lysander Grpyhonheart's family when he was a child, killing his parents and separating him from his siblings. He was wounded during the attack, and paralyzed for several years. A childhood of impotence has driven this young man to perform great deeds that have culminated in his founding of the Kingdom of Palaedra.

specialty.description: Increases the speed of Pikemen or Halberdiers by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills for each level attained after 1st level.
specialty.name: Pikemen
